price: Nokorε sε, sε Yεpε biribi a, Y’asεm a yεka kyerε adekorͻ no ara ne sε: “Yε!’ “ Na ayε.
arabic: إِنَّمَا قَوۡلُنَا لِشَيۡءٍ إِذَآ أَرَدۡنَٰهُ أَن نَّقُولَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innamā qawlunā lishayin idhā aradnāhu an naqūla lahu kun fayakūnu
